channel.title: Posts on Haoming Hu's website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Haoming Hu's website

item.title: Groups infected most by the COVID-19
item.description: Author: Haoming Hu Abstract This report collects information about COVID-19 cases in Toronto. It analyzes some groups that are likely to be infected by the virus, after which to raise their awareness and better prevent this virus’s spread. And we did find out that certain age groups and gender are more susceptible. Introduction We use Wickham et al. (2019) and (“COVID19 Cases in Toronto” 2020) and Wickham (2016).

item.title: Introduction
item.description: abstract My abstract. Introduction We use Wickham et al. (2019). 2020 is a hard year for everybody due to the widespread of the novel virus. In order to raise awareness of the general public, it is a good way to expose them with the propriate data, which indicates some virus-related factors. Specifically, we want to know if variables like gender, age group and so on would affect the possibility of contracting the virus.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.
